arts.ttl: Chesterfield end losing run with win over Newport
arts.sum: Matt Baker opened the scoring for the visitors in the 40th minute before goals from Ollie Banks and Pepple.

Chesterfield's 1-0 defeat to Colchester on Tuesday night was their fourth straight defeat in the league, and they have now lost five of their last six games. Newport got back to winning ways on Tuesd...
